body_content.explanation: designed to closely follow or fit around the curved surface or shape of something:
examples: They developed a new medical scanner that is more contoured to the shape of the body.
The contoured sole of the cycling shoe gives an incredible fit.
We love the car's sleek, contoured design.
The underwear gives your body a smoother, more contoured appearance.

body_content.explanation: (of a map) having lines that join points of equal height or depth, in a way that shows high and low areas of land:
examples: Pinned to the wall was a huge contoured map.
The map is GPS-compatible and fully contoured.
